mapper.select: select jl.id as id, jt.journal_nm as title, jt.issn as issn, jt.eissn as eissn, jl.`Author(s)` as author, jt.factor as factor, STR_TO_DATE(concat(jl.`Publication Start Year`,'-', SUBSTR(now(),6)), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as year from journal_impact_temp jt inner join journal_impact_low jl on jt.issn = jl.issn order by jt.factor desc limit 5
